### 2. Add Topics (Copy & Paste)

```

```

Click **Save changes**

### 3. Enable Discussions
Go to: https://github.com/KR-Labs/krl-model-zoo/settings

Scroll to "Features" section ‚Üí Check ‚úÖ **Discussions**

### 4. Upload Social Preview (Optional but Recommended)
Still in Settings ‚Üí Scroll to "Social preview" ‚Üí Click **Edit**

Upload a 1280x640px image with:
- KR-Labs logo
- "Model Zoo" title
- Key features
